examples.title: Tab View with Forms
examples.description: Tab view containing form elements in different tabs
examples.code:
<dotbox-tab-view>
  <dotbox-tab-panel id="personal" label="Personal Info">
    <dotbox-form layout="vertical">
      <dotbox-textbox label="First Name" required></dotbox-textbox>
      <dotbox-textbox label="Last Name" required></dotbox-textbox>
      <dotbox-textbox label="Email" type="email" required></dotbox-textbox>
    </dotbox-form>
  </dotbox-tab-panel>
  <dotbox-tab-panel id="preferences" label="Preferences">
    <dotbox-form layout="vertical">
      <dotbox-dropdown label="Theme" options='[{"value":"light","label":"Light"},{"value":"dark","label":"Dark"}]'></dotbox-dropdown>
      <dotbox-checkbox label="Email notifications"></dotbox-checkbox>
      <dotbox-checkbox label="SMS notifications"></dotbox-checkbox>
    </dotbox-form>
  </dotbox-tab-panel>
  <dotbox-tab-panel id="security" label="Security">
    <dotbox-form layout="vertical">
      <dotbox-textbox label="Current Password" type="password"></dotbox-textbox>
      <dotbox-textbox label="New Password" type="password"></dotbox-textbox>
      <dotbox-textbox label="Confirm Password" type="password"></dotbox-textbox>
    </dotbox-form>
  </dotbox-tab-panel>
</dotbox-tab-view>
